Prevention. To prevent dryness or irritation to your vocal cords: 1  Don't smoke, and avoid secondhand smoke. 2  Smoke dries your throat and irritates your vocal cords. 3  Limit alcohol and caffeine. 4  These cause you to lose total body water. 5  Drink plenty of water. 6  Fluids help keep the mucus in your throat thin and easy to clear.
